!Fishermen's Guild Member O'Fulle: I may look chipper, but I feel terrible! Recently a delivery of ingredients for our bait of chill was hijacked by *fettered souls* at the *Death Pass*! It was several years worth of supplies! A devastating loss! Are you here for bait? Sorry, I couldn't make any if I wanted to. What can I do?
